name: GOTCHA MAZE
description:
2 Player splitscreen game, where your goal is to gather the GOTCHA letters before the opponent. Use spells obtained from chests to gain an advantage, but be careful, you can walk into your own traps!

Red: WASD movement, Q to use spell, E to illuminate maze

Blue: ARROW movement, PERIOD to use spell, SLASH to illuminate maze.

More instructions in-game.

2022 Joint Jam theme: "GOTCHA!"

All assets (other than the font) made by us. Font is Century Schoolbook, comes default with Microsoft Windows.
